smart_goals.description: Reduce blood glucose level from 250mg/dL to target range of 80-130mg/dL within 3 months through proper insulin administration and blood sugar monitoring 4 times daily
Complete 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic activity OR 75 minutes of vigorous-intensity aerobic activity per week, plus strength training exercises 2 days per week

Achieve and maintain target weight of 140 pounds through balanced nutrition plan within 6 months by consuming prescribed portions of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean protein, and healthy fats daily
Maintain LDL cholesterol below 100mg/dL and HDL cholesterol at or above 40mg/dL through medication adherence and dietary changes, checked quarterly
Maintain blood pressure at target 120/80mmHg through regular monitoring, stress management, and adequate sleep (7-8 hours nightly)
Reduce blood glucose level from 250mg/dL to target range of 80-130mg/dL within 3 months through proper insulin administration and blood sugar monitoring 4 times daily
Complete 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic exercise or 75 minutes of vigorous aerobic exercise, plus 2 strength training sessions per week for the next 12 weeks
Achieve target weight of 140 pounds through balanced nutrition plan and exercise within 6 months by losing 1-2 pounds per week
Maintain LDL cholesterol below 100mg/dL and HDL above 40mg/dL through dietary management and regular exercise over the next 3 months
Schedule and attend monthly doctor check-ups for the next 6 months to monitor diabetes management progress and adjust treatment plan as needed
